Title: Relates to the use and sale of tobacco at state-operated institutions of the state university of New York
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the sale of tobacco at state-operated institutions of the state university of New York, and prohibiting the use of tobacco by students at state-operated institutions of the state university of New York and vehicles owned, rented or leased by the state university of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the use and sale of tobacco at state-operated institutions of the state university of New York
